entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 10:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ESE 40 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 in the Wreckhouse area late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers near midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 90 km/h gusting to 110 except gusting to 160 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
